<h3 id="X13890">X(13890)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND 1st AURIGA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; ((2*a+b+c)*K-a^2*(a+b+c)*(-a+b+c))*S+K*(a+b+c)*a^2  :  :  , where K=4*S*sqrt(R*(4*R+r))<p>X(13890) lies on these lines: {6,13944}, {55,8983}, {371,8196}, {485,9834}, {590,5599}, {1125,13945}, {3068,3361}, {5600,7969}, {5601,8972}, {8186,13888}, {8190,13889}, {8197,13893}, {8198,8974}, {8199,8975}, {8200,8976}, {8981,11252}, {8987,12456}, {8988,12460}, {8992,12474}, {8993,12476}, {8997,13176}, {9540,11822}, {11207,13846}, {11366,13883}, {11384,13884}, {11492,13887}, {11837,13885}, {11843,13886}, {11861,13892}, {11865,13895}, {11867,13896}, {11869,13897}, {11871,13898}, {11873,13901}, {11875,13903}, {11877,13904}, {11879,13905}, {11881,13906}, {11883,13907}, {12345,13908}, {12454,13911}, {12458,13912}, {12462,13913}, {13228,13922}</p>
